text:
In the function definition there is no mention of `client_id`, but the parameters listed in the description say there is `client_id` available.

https://github.com/idan/oauthlib/blob/8671b4bf6bfb4c6e457d97a8d0b3ad7f638d75e1/oauthlib/oauth2/rfc6749/request_validator.py#L262
title: Documentation error in oauthlib.oauth2.RequestValidator.save_bearer_token

text: The documentation is indeed wrong and the client_id is not passed. It is available through request.client_id however.
